result.execSummary:
The defendant Devonte Dominque Poe was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: $443 costs--DOC collect.  If extended supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Devonte Dominque Poe

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: from attorney Robert O'Reilly RE U Visa - File per Judge Daley

Defendant Devonte Dominque Poe in court in custody with attorney Jason Mitchel Daane.  Jodi Dabson Bollendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Amended Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived.  No contest plea, Court finds defendant guilty.  Court orders 1 year 6 months WSP, 6 months extended supervision; 107 days sentence credit; not eligible for prison programs; any treatment deemed necessary; DOC collect $443 costs.

Defendant Devonte Dominque Poe in court in custody with attorney Jason Mitchel Daane.  Mark M. Jahnke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2015 at 08:00 am.

Defendant Devonte Dominque Poe in court in custody with attorney Jason Mitchel Daane.  Jodi Dabson Bollendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily, rights given.  Court binds Defendant over for the filing of an Information.  Information filed, copy to defendant, reading waived.  Defendant stands mute, not guilty plea entered by Court.  Status conference scheduled for October 8, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Devonte Dominque Poe in court in custody with attorney Sean Drury for Jason Mitchel Daane.  Jodi Dabson Bollendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense asking for continuance, states witnesses cancelled. Defendant does want preliminary hearing, parties agree to continuance. Time limits waived.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 31, 2015 at 09:15 am.

Defendant Devonte Dominque Poe in court in custody with attorney Jason Mitchel Daane.  Richard Jay Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Preliminary hearing requested, scheduled for August 24, 2015 at 11:00am.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 24, 2015 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Devonte Dominque Poe in court in custody with attorney Joshua H. Klaff.  Cheniqua White with intern Christa Johnson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Complaint filed, copy to Defendant, penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 11, 2015 at 3:00pm.
No violent or disorderly conduct with victim: M.M.
